name.ja: トポロジック・ブラスター・ドラゴン

text.en:
2+ Effect Monsters
You cannot Summon/Set monsters to any Extra Monster Zone this card points to. If a monster(s) is Special Summoned to a zone a Link Monster points to, while this card is in the Extra Monster Zone: Apply 1 of these effects, but you cannot apply that same effect of "Topologic Blaster Dragon" again this turn.
● Shuffle all other monsters on the field into the Deck.
● Shuffle all Spells and Traps on the field into the Deck.
● Look at your opponent's Extra Deck and banish 1 card from it.
